Text: thank you for this and all your other great contributions.. can you  please try to find 'bourbon thret' for us.
wetbeak, how's your French?  I have Bourbon Thret in French, but not in English.

well, it's average.  i got through the 'bros' story..   i recogonize one word in five. then i use a translator. its still fun!.. many thanks for the reply.. my real interest is as an illustrator. (and i can't type properly!)  and would rather draw than practice typin'.. english is my first language and i have a rudimentary understanding of german, italian and bahasa indo... you make my day.. lots of days. gracie.
also please post it. you are a turbo-radical ( yes, that's a compliment)....    :)

wetbeak, here you go:
